input.sentences: everyone int he family loves when grandma makes her chocolate lamb .
it is an intensive process | involving baking | basting | and molding chocolate .
it also involves sprinkles for the little kids .

output.sentences: Creativity makes for a good trait when you want to make something special for a vegetarian who loves lamb.
The process will be involving molding, and lots of patience.
If there are kids, the idea involves a lot of sprinkles!
Creating this idea can be hard so get your Grandma, or any of your family who loves you to help.
The result, when finished will be nothing short of delicious!
